sentence.text: Patient 2 was born to non-consanguineous parents.
She had dolichocephaly, craniosynostosis, bilateral nystagmus, short limbs, brachydactyly, fine sparse hair, frontal bossing, micrognathia, low-set ears and widely spaced teeth (Fig. 1f,g).
Renal dysfunction was noted at the age of 14 months.
She received a kidney transplant at the age of 5 years.
Hepatic cystic disease was detected at the age of 4 years.
Psychomotor development was delayed (walking at the age of 3 years and no words at the age of 5 years).
A brain MRI scan at the age of 4 years revealed no abnormalities.
